data.title: 准备以至少 30 秒的时间回答以下问题
data.subject: Describe ways that people waste time.
data.answer: Despite the fact that it is challenging to depict and generalize reasons why people waste time, I would say by instinct that it is the temporary relief that people are after. That is to say, routine work keeps people highly occupied both physically and mentally, which necessarily generates stresses and strains which exhaust people. Therefore, people tend to do things that are refreshingly relaxing after work. And once they are into that light mode, inertia prevents people from getting back to production mode. Wasting time undoubtedly will decrease people's work efficiency, which in turn will lead to consequences such as missing deadlines and loss of motivation. In terms of ways people can avoid wasting time, it is highly recommended that people make plans with a strict deadline for every single task prior to taking action. Alternatively, people are suggested to keep away from any potential distractions while performing tasks. For example, they can turn off notifications from all social media beforehand. (161字)
